reference.title: Create Database
reference.shortdesc: Creates a new database, and optionally defines one or more new, empty tables within that database. To access this dialog, select the project in which the database is to be created using the Package Explorer. Then, either right-click the project and select MOTODEV StudioCreate Database or select Manage DatabaseCreate Database from the MOTODEV menu.

strow.stentry: The name of the SQLite database to be created.

Use this area to specify tables to be created within the new database. Clicking Add brings up the Create New Table dialog, with which you specify the particulars of a given database table. Note that you can have zero, one, or more database tables created within the new database. As well, at any time you can manually use the Create New Table dialog to add, edit, or remove tables within this database.
